sentences.en: A shirt and jersey and an ordinary pair of trousers will do nicely, thank you.
sentences.cn: 一件衬衫和毛衣，再加一条普通的裤子就很不错，谢谢你。

sentences.en: Governor William Livingston addressed the New Jersey Assembly.
sentences.cn: 威廉·利文斯顿州长在新泽西州议会上发表了演说。

sentences.en: He had arrived from Jersey by jet.
sentences.cn: 他乘喷气式飞机从泽西飞来。

sentences.en: He wears a cotton jersey when he plays football.
His grey jersey and trousers were sodden with the rain.
sentences.cn: 他的灰色针织毛衫和长裤全都被雨水淋透了。

sentences.en: His jersey was left in tatters.
sentences.cn: 他的运动衫已破烂不堪。

sentences.en: Jersey is the most touristy of the islands.
sentences.cn: 这些岛屿中就数泽西岛最能吸引游客。

sentences.en: She is wearing tight, black leggings and a baggy green jersey.
sentences.cn: 她身穿黑色紧身裤和一件宽松的绿色针织套衫。

sentences.en: She wore clinging ivory silk jersey.
sentences.cn: 她穿着乳白色紧身绸衣。

sentences.en: Sheila had come to dinner in a black jersey top.
sentences.cn: 希拉身着一件黑色针织上装来参加晚宴。

sentences.en: The Port Authority is an agency jointly run by New York and New Jersey.
sentences.cn: 港务局是由纽约州和新泽西州共同管理的机构。

sentences.en: They dug up their New Jersey garden and moved it lock, stock, and barrel back home.
sentences.cn: 他们把在新泽西的花园刨了个遍，然后将里面的东西一样不落地搬回了家。

sentences.en: They traced the van to a New Jersey car rental agency.
sentences.cn: 他们查出面包车属于新泽西州的一家租车行。

sentences.en: They were dressed alike in blue jersey and knickers.
sentences.cn: 他们穿着一致,都是蓝色的运动衫和灯笼短裤.

phrases.tran_cn: 棉毛衫；全棉单面布；针织绵布
双面平纹布；双面针织物
单面针织物；平纹；单面汗布

trans.tran_cn: 毛织运动衫，毛线衫，泽西岛，泽西种乳牛
trans.tran_en: a shirt made of soft material, worn by players of sports such as football and rugby
